name: The Epic Easter
description:
The Epic Easter is a game where you play as Pedro, a young boy who wakes up at 2 am on Easter day, eager to see if the Easter Bunny has visited his home and left him eggs. To his surprise, he finds a note from the bunny that leads him on an epic adventure.

The note reveals that the Easter Bunny has left a portal in Pedro's home, which leads to the bunny's factory. 

Before Pedro knows it, the time has flown by, and it's already 2 pm. The Easter Bunny thanks Pedro for his help and sends him back through the portal to his home. Pedro is left with memories of an unforgettable Easter adventure, and he can't wait to tell his parents what happened. The Epic Easter is a game full of magic, wonder, and adventure that captures the joy of the Easter holiday.

This story was inspired by a story that came in my mind.
